messages.title: A message from your local Lib Dem ward councillors
messages.content: As your ward councillors, we're working hard on the issues that matter to our community. Protecting the green belt and village conservation areas from inappropriate planning applications, securing investment in road and pavement repairs and tackling speeding and parking problems in our area.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election here in York Outer will be a close race between Keith Aspden's Liberal Democrats and the Conservative candidate. A vote for the Labour Party will just help the Conservatives win here.

issues.environment: Protecting the green belt and village conservation areas from inappropriate planning applications.
issues.health: Issues such as the underfunding of our local schools and hospitals.

housing.content: Protecting the green belt and village conservation areas from inappropriate planning applications.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has been instrumental in helping us to get things done for the villages of Rural West York Ward.

contactInformation.address: 12A Victoria Farm Estate, Water Lane, York, YO30 6PQ

images.caption: Anne Hook & James Barker, Your local Lib Dem ward councillors for Rural West York Ward

leaflet.additionalNotes: With your support, we hope to soon have an MP who will work hard for our community.
